    Method parameters in com.project.alertapp.services with type arguments of type Alerts
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    AlertsService.alertChecker​(List<Alerts> alertsList, BigDecimal stockCurrentPrice)
    This method takes a list of alerts belonging to a stock and compares it with the current price of the stock and triggers the alert as a result of this comparison.
